short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple popup for taking notes and organizing them easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scratch Paper is an intuitive note-taking tool designed for simplicity and accessibility. Featuring a convenient popup window, it allows users to quickly jot down notes and access them with ease. You can save multiple notes for later reference, making it perfect for capturing temporary information or serving as a straightforward workspace for daily planning.

The popup design is ideal for reminders and organizing tasks effectively. Scratch Paper also includes both dark and light themes, catering to your visual preferences while you work.
